title: Tea of Destiny
overview: As a heroine in the martial arts world, Jing Qi'er descends from the mountain where her sect is located and comes to Carefree Tea House to find the miracle cure, Rejuvenating Pill, in an attempt to save her 'gravely ill' foster father. There, she meets Huan Yunhua, the master of Yunshan Pavilion. He disguises himself as the long-lost young master of the tea house, aiming to loot it. Both harboring their own secrets, they pretend to be a couple. However, this leads to the unraveling of old grudges and misunderstandings, inadvertently restoring the reputation of the tea house and causing them to fall in love with each other. In the vast martial arts world, joy and happiness are within easy reach for them.
